verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;
To <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>; to <S%H995>perceive<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>;
To <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H7919>wisdom<s%>, <S%H6664>justice<s%>, and <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H4339>equity<s%>;
To <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>prudence<s%> to the <S%H6612>simple<s%>, to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and will <S%H3254>increase<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%>; and a man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> shall <S%H7069>attain<s%> unto wise <S%H8458>counsels<s%>:
To <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, and the <S%H4426>interpretation<s%>; the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and their dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: but <S%H191>fools<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>:
For they shall be a <S%H3880>ornament<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto your <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H6060>chains<s%> about your <S%H1621>neck<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H14>you<s%>, consent you not.
If they <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> with <S%H693>us<s%>, let us lay wait for <S%H1818>blood<s%>, let us <S%H6845>lurk<s%> privately for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>:
Let us swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> as the <S%H7585>grave<s%>; and <S%H8549>whole<s%>, as those that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>:
We shall <S%H4672>find<s%> all <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>substance<s%>, we shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H7998>plunder<s%>:
<S%H5307>Cast<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H259>us<s%>; let us all have one <S%H3599>purse<s%>:
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3212>walk<s%> not you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H4513>them<s%>; refrain your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from their <S%H5410>path<s%>:
For their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
Surely in <S%H2600>vain<s%> the <S%H7568>net<s%> is <S%H2219>spread<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of any <S%H1167>bird<s%>.
And they lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood<s%>; they lurk <S%H6845>privately<s%> for their own <S%H5315>lives<s%>.
So are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of every one that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1215>gain<s%>; which takes <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the owners <S%H1167>there<s%>.
<S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> <S%H7442>cries<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>; she <S%H5414>utters<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets<s%>:

She <S%H7121>cries<s%> in the chief <S%H7218>place<s%> of <S%H1993>concourse<s%>, in the <S%H6607>openings<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>: in the <S%H5892>city<s%> she <S%H559>utters<s%> her <S%H561>words<s%>, saying,

How <S%H6612>long<s%>, you simple ones, will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6612>simplicity<s%>? and the <S%H3887>scorners<s%> <S%H2530>delight<s%> in their <S%H3944>scorning<s%>, and <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> you at my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>: <S%H5042>behold<s%>, I will pour out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> unto <S%H3045>you<s%>, I will make known my words unto <S%H1697>you<s%>.
Because I have <S%H7121>called<s%>, and you <S%H3985>refused<s%>; I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and no man <S%H7181>regarded<s%>;
But you have set at <S%H6544>nothing<s%> all my <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, and <S%H14>would<s%> none of my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>:
I also will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at your <S%H343>calamity<s%>; I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%>;

When your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> as <S%H7722>desolation<s%>, and your <S%H343>destruction<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> as a <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>; when <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%> comes upon <S%H935>you<s%>.
Then shall they <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H6030>me<s%>, but I will not answer; they shall seek me <S%H7836>early<s%>, but they shall not find <S%H4672>me<s%>:
For that they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and did not <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:
They <S%H14>would<s%> none of my <S%H6098>counsel<s%>: they <S%H5006>despised<s%> all my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>.
Therefore shall they <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their own <S%H1870>way<s%>, and be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with their own <S%H4156>devices<s%>.
For the turning <S%H4878>away<s%> of the <S%H6612>simple<s%> shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H7962>them<s%>, and the prosperity of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall destroy <S%H6>them<s%>.
But whoever <S%H8085>listens<s%> unto me shall <S%H7931>live<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>, and shall be <S%H7599>quiet<s%> from <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
